definition[0]: a part of a machine that allows gas, steam etc to escape when the pressure becomes too great
definition[1]: something that allows you to get rid of strong feelings without doing any harm
example[0]: Being able to express emotion is a healthy safety valve for the relationship.
definition[2]: a small part on a machine that opens to let out steam or pressure when it becomes too great
example[1]: the safety valve device on the boiler
